Name: strncat
Warning: Easily used incorrectly (e.g., incorrectly computing the correct maximum size to add) [MS-banned] (CWE-120)
Suggestion: Consider strcat_s, strlcat, snprintf, or automatically resizing strings

Name: strncat

Suggestion: Consider strcat_s, strlcat, snprintf, or automatically resizing strings
